inclusion.criterion: Internal mammary sentinel lymph node biopsy (IM-SLNB) provides a less invasive method of assessing the IMLN than surgical dissection.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The modified radiotracer injection technique could significantly improve the IM-SLN detection rate.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Axillary sentinel lymph node biopsy has a high success rate and accuracy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient is able and willing to sign informed consent forms.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have received neoadjuvant therapy (including neoadjuvant chemotherapy and / or endocrine therapy).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a previous history of breast cancer.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is eligible for the trial based on inclusion criteria and exclusion criteria.
